description: User browses all recipes and cookbooks
steps: Navigate to home page
Scroll to recipes section
Verify grid of recipe and cookbook cards is displayed
Verify each card shows title, description, and icon
Verify cookbooks show recipe count badge
Navigate to home page recipes section
Enter search query in search input
Verify URL updates with q parameter
Verify filtered results match search query
Verify result count updates
Clear search to show all recipes
Navigate to home page recipes section
Click a tag filter badge
Verify URL updates with tags parameter
Verify only recipes with selected tag are shown
Click All to clear filter
Verify all recipes are displayed
Navigate to home page recipes section
Click sort toggle button
Verify sort changes between newest first and setup order
Verify URL updates with asc parameter
Verify recipe order changes accordingly

description: No results shows clear filters option
steps: Navigate to home page recipes section
Enter search query that matches no recipes
Verify no recipes match message appears
Click Clear all filters link
Verify all recipes are displayed again
